name: Dionysus Drinking Darts
description:
This game was made for the Mini Jam #7 game jam.

The theme was Greek Mythology with a limitation on using only 4 colors.

Colors used:

#000000, #FFFFFF, #FF0000, #EAD2BB

The project was written in Javascript, using the Phaser3 game engine.

This is my first solo game jam, creating all code and assets, so it's a pretty small and simple game :)

Play using the Space Bar.

Enjoy!
